price: 29. Et tu diras : « Seigneur, veuille me faire aborder sur des rivages bénis, car Tu es Celui Qui guide vers les meilleurs rivages ! »
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi anzil'nī munzalan mubārakan wa-anta khayru al-munzilīna
